content: this is a free written pattern and photo guide for this modern crochet patchwork throw/blanket sample is worked in nine different colours but can be adapted to use any colour combinations beautiful simple and suitable for beginners leaves a neat straight edge and corners meaning that no border is needed so that a contemporary feel is maintained gauge is not critical but will affect yarn quantities - first square should measure approximately 10cm x 10cm 4in x 4 in blanket size approximately 120cm x 120cm but drape of the stitch tends to make this slightly longer than the width
